title: LF teammates for dynamic queue. Serious but fun players
body:
I just reached level 30 and I'm looking for serious but fun players to team up with to climb up the ladder. I don't know anyone here in OCE as I'm new in AU. 

I'm from the Garena PH Server. Previous rank - Gold I. 

Looking forward to some fun **toxic-free** games ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)


Update: So I was placed in Silver atm. Please don't add a person and after you saw his/her rank and unfriended him/her after. We all know how that feels even for a little bit. Please have some respect for people in lower tiers.

replies.body: Add me! GORDONNODROG, Im in B5 atm but was S4 last season. Im also looking for people to play with.
I can't seem to find your IGN. Is it just Legolas?
